document_data.name: Silverymoon Ale
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/The Rogue of the World|31}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverymoon Ale''' was a variety of hearty bodied [[ale]] from just outside of the northern city of [[Silverymoon]], served at the [[Silvermoon Playhouse]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Despite the name "Silverymoon Ale," the drink was not produced in the Gem of the North. In reality, it was brewed by a small [[dwarf|dwarven]] community near Silverymoon.
